amendment.description: An amendment numbered 178 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the Department of Defense from creating, procuring, or displaying any map that depicts Taiwan or any offshore island under the administration of the government of Taiwan as part of the territory of the People's Republic of China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
